brainly_data.question: Which was the main purpose of the Declaration of Independence? A. It outlined the new democratic government for America. B. It was an advertisement designed to gather revolutionary support. C. It cut the colonies' ties with England. D. It requested some changes in the way the British ruled the colonies.
brainly_data.subject: Social studies
